subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Tony Stewart has won two consecutive races and three of the eight since the Nextel Cup Chase started on Sept. 17. That recent spurt shows a weakness in the playoff system.
snippet: Tony Stewart has won two consecutive races and three of the eight since the Nextel Cup Chase started on Sept. 17. That recent spurt shows a weakness in the playoff system.
